description:
It`s time for class 4-1 to put their cooking skills to the test in this Home Ec throwdown! Who will create the best egg dish? Wait... what happened to the egg? Meanwhile, a new start reminds us of the importance of using protection, and Kirari gets a taste of high-class living.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle for the King of Home Ec!! / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
Chouri Jisshuu Ou: Ketteisen!! / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
調理実習王 決定戦!! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ
